type InputBinding = class inherit Freezable interface ICommandSource

summary.span: 表示 和命令之间的绑定。

span.span: Represents a binding between an and a command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过创建 来指定用户输入调用命令。You can specify that user input invokes a command by creating a . 当用户执行指定的输入时，将执行设置为 属性的 。When the user performs the specified input, the that is set to the property is executed. 您可以通过对 、和 属性创建绑定，指定 调用在对象上定义的命令。You can specify that the invokes a command that is defined on an object by creating a binding on the , , and properties. 这使你可以定义自定义命令并将其与用户输入相关联。This enables you to define a custom command and associate it with user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 "示例" 部分中的第二个示例。For more information, see the second example in the Examples section. 可以通过向 注册 ，在特定对象上或在类级别上定义 。An can be defined on a specific object or at the class level by registering a with the . 类本身不支持 XAML 用法，因为它不公开公共的无参数构造函数（有一个无参数的构造函数，但它受保护）。The class itself does not support XAML usage because it does not expose a public parameterless constructor (there is a parameterless constructor, but it is protected). 但是，派生类可以公开公共构造函数，因此可以设置派生类的属性，这些属性是从 继承的，并使用 XAML 用法。However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and therefore can set properties on the derived class that are inherited from with a XAML usage. 可以在 XAML 中实例化的两个现有 派生类，并且可以在 XAML 中设置属性 和 。Two existing -derived classes that can be instantiated in XAML and can set properties in XAML are and . 在 XAML 中设置的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 编程中的典型属性，并将一个或多个 对象作为值使用 属性。The typical property in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] programming that is set in XAML and takes one or more objects as values is the property. ## XAML 对象元素用法XAML Object Element Usage \<*inputBindingDerivedClass/*>\<*inputBindingDerivedClass…/*> ## XAML 值XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` 支持对象元素语法的 的派生类，如 或 。A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or . 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 将 绑定到 命令。The following example shows how to use a to bind a to the command. 执行 key 势时，将调用 "打开" 命令。When the key gesture is performed, the Open command is invoked. [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] 下面的示例演示如何将自定义命令绑定到 的对象。The following examples show how to bind a custom command to objects. 这些示例创建一个应用程序，使用户可以通过执行下列操作之一来更改背景色：These examples create an application that enables the user to change the background color by performing one of the following actions: - 单击按钮。Clicking a button. - 按 CTRL + C。Pressing CTRL+C. - 右键单击 之外的 。Right-clicking a (outside the ). 第一个示例创建一个名为 `SimpleDelegateCommand`的类。The first example creates a class named `SimpleDelegateCommand`. 此类接受委托，以便创建命令的对象可以定义命令执行时发生的操作。This class accepts a delegate so that the object creating the command can define the action that occurs when the command executes. `SimpleDelegateCommand` 还定义属性，这些属性指定哪些键和鼠标输入调用命令。`SimpleDelegateCommand` also defines properties that specify what key and mouse input invokes the command. `GestureKey` 和 `GestureModifier` 指定键盘输入;`MouseGesture` 指定鼠标输入。`GestureKey` and `GestureModifier` specify the keyboard input; `MouseGesture` specifies the mouse input. [!code-csharp[InputCommandBinding#DelegateCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/inputcommandbinding/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#delegatecommand)] [!code-vb[InputCommandBinding#DelegateCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/inputcommandbinding/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#delegatecommand)] 下面的示例创建并初始化 `ColorChangeCommand`，这是一个 `SimpleDelegateCommand`。The following example creates and initializes the `ColorChangeCommand`, which is a `SimpleDelegateCommand`. 该示例还定义调用命令时执行的方法，并设置 `GestureKey`、`GestureModifier`和 `MouseGesture` 属性。The example also defines the method that executes when the command is invoked and sets the `GestureKey`, `GestureModifier`, and `MouseGesture` properties. 应用程序将在程序开始时调用 `InitializeCommand` 方法，例如在 的构造函数中。An application would call the `InitializeCommand` method when the program begins, such as in the constructor of a . [!code-csharp[InputCommandBinding#InitializeCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/inputcommandbinding/csharp/mainwindow.xaml.cs#initializecommand)] [!code-vb[InputCommandBinding#InitializeCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/inputcommandbinding/visualbasic/mainwindow.xaml.vb#initializecommand)] 最后，下面的示例创建用户界面。Finally, the following example creates the user interface. 该示例将 和 添加到包含 和 的 。The example adds a and a to a that contains a and a . 当用户在 中选择某项时，他（她）可以将背景色更改为所选颜色。When the user selects an item in the , he or she can change the color of the background to the selected color. 在每种情况下，`CommandParameter` 属性都绑定到 中的选定项，`Command` 属性绑定到 `ColorChangeCommand`。In each case, the `CommandParameter` property is bound to the selected item in the , and the `Command` property is bound to the `ColorChangeCommand`. 、和 属性绑定到 `SimpleDelegateCommand` 类上的相应属性。The , , and properties are bound to the corresponding properties on the `SimpleDelegateCommand` class. [!code-xaml[InputCommandBinding#UI](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/inputcommandbinding/csharp/mainwindow.xaml#ui)]

summary.span: 提供从 派生的类的基初始化。

span.span: Provides base initialization for classes derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从技术上说， 不是抽象类，但无参数构造函数特意受到保护的访问。 is not technically an abstract class, but the parameterless constructor is deliberately protected access. 这会使 成为 XAML 的 "抽象" 类的效果。This has the effect of making an "abstract" class for XAML. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中有一些现有属性，这些属性的 XAML 用法需要 类型的对象，但你不能在 XAML 中指定 实例。There are existing properties in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] that have XAML usages that expect objects of type , but you cannot specify an instance in XAML. 相反，您可以指定特定于设备的 派生类之一作为值，例如 或 。Instead, you can specify one of the device-specific derived classes as values, for instance or .

para.span: 如果实现支持 XAML 用法的自定义 ，请使用此构造函数进行基本初始化。

span.span: If you implement a custom that supports a XAML usage, use this constructor for base initialization.

summary.span: 用指定的命令和输入笔势初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified command and input gesture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你是使用现有输入绑定类的软件开发人员，则通常不会使用此构造函数，即使你要定义自定义命令也是如此。If you are a software developer using existing input binding classes, you generally will not use this constructor, even if you are defining custom commands. 相反，你将使用派生类的构造函数（ 和 ），否则将使用此构造函数作为自定义类的基本实例化。Instead, you will either use constructors of derived classes ( and ), or you will use this constructor as the base instantiation of a custom class. 尽管 类在原则上支持不同的输入设备，但在实践中，你必须选择输入绑定将表示的设备。Although the class supports different input devices in principle, in practice you must choose which device the input binding will represent. 仅可对输入绑定设置一个 值，而手势特定于设备。You only can set only one value on the input binding, and gestures are device-specific. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此构造函数将 与 相关联。The following example shows how to use this constructor to associate a with a . [!code-csharp[commandlibrarysnippets#InputBindingAddingCommand](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandLibrarySnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#inputbindingaddingcommand)] [!code-vb[commandlibrarysnippets#InputBindingAddingCommand](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandLibrarySnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#inputbindingaddingcommand)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类不支持 XAML 用法，因为它不公开公共无参数构造函数（它具有无参数的构造函数，但受保护）。The class does not support XAML usage because it does not expose a public parameterless constructor (it has a parameterless constructor, but it is protected). 但是，派生类可以公开公共构造函数，因此可以使用继承自 的属性。However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and therefore, can use properties that are inherited from . 可以在 XAML 中实例化的两个现有 派生类，并且可以使用 XAML 用法设置属性 和 。Two existing derived classes that can be instantiated in XAML and can set properties with XAML usages are and . 引用一个类型转换器，该转换器使某些预先存在的 实现能够以字符串的形式指定值。 references a type converter that enables certain preexisting implementations to specify values in the form of a string. 此类型转换行为设置此属性的属性值形式。This type conversion behavior sets the attribute value form of this property. 您还可以将 、和 属性绑定到在对象上定义的 中。You can also bind the , , and properties to an that is defined on an object. 这使你可以定义自定义命令并将其与用户输入相关联。This enables you to define a custom command and associate it with user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 中的第二个示例。For more information, see the second example in . ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage <`inputBindingDerivedClass` `Command`= ""/><`inputBindingDerivedClass` `Command`=""/> ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` 支持对象元素语法的 的派生类，如 或 。A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or . 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. `iCommandImplementation` 支持对象元素语法的 的对象实现（有一个公共的无参数构造函数）。An object implementation of that supports object element syntax (has a public parameterless constructor). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 将 绑定到 命令。The following example shows how to use a to bind a to the command. 执行 key 势时，将调用 "打开" 命令。When the key gesture is performed, the Open command is invoked. [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ CommandParameter { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };
member this.CommandParameter : obj with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置特定命令的命令特定数据。

span.span: Gets or sets the command-specific data for a particular command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性用于在执行命令时将特定信息传递给命令。The property is used to pass specific information to the command when it is executed. 数据的类型由命令定义。The type of the data is defined by the command. 很多命令不需要命令参数;对于这些命令，将忽略传递的任何命令参数。Many commands do not expect command parameters; for these commands, any command parameters passed will be ignored. 如果与输入绑定关联的命令是 ，则在处理此命令时，输入绑定的 将通过 和 事件数据传递到 处理程序。If the command that an input binding is associated with is a , the of the input binding is passed to the handlers through the and the event data when the command is processed. 为每个命令定义了命令参数的数据类型和用途，可以 `null`。The data type and purpose of the command parameter are defined differently for each command and can be `null`. 可以将 、和 属性绑定到在对象上定义的 中。You can bind the , , and properties to an that is defined on an object. 这使你可以定义自定义命令并将其与用户输入相关联。This enables you to define a custom command and associate it with user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅 中的第二个示例。For more information, see the second example in . 类不支持 XAML 用法，因为它不公开公共无参数构造函数（它具有无参数的构造函数，但受保护）。The class does not support XAML usage because it does not expose a public parameterless constructor (it has a parameterless constructor, but it is protected). 但是，派生类可以公开公共构造函数，因此，可以使用 XAML 用法来设置继承自 的属性。However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and therefore, can set properties that are inherited from with XAML usage. 可以在 XAML 中实例化的两个现有 派生类，并且可以在 XAML 中设置属性 和 。Two existing derived classes that can be instantiated in XAML and can set properties in XAML are and . ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` 支持对象元素语法的 的派生类，如 或 。A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or . 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. `commandParameterString` 由特定命令处理的字符串。A string that is processed by a particular command. 字符串是用于命令参数的通用类型，因为它们可以在 XAML 中轻松设置。Strings are the common type used for command parameters because they can be easily set in XAML. 有关预期的字符串格式及其用途，请参阅与输入绑定关联的特定命令的文档。For the expected string format and its purpose, see the documentation for the particular command that the input binding is associated with. 许多命令不需要参数。Many commands do not expect parameters. `commandParameterObject` 由特定命令处理的对象。An object that is processed by a particular command. 所有现有 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 命令都使用字符串。All existing [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] commands use strings. 因此，此属性元素语法只与自定义命令方案相关。Therefore, this property element syntax is only relevant for custom command scenarios. 为了支持此语法，`commandParameterObject` 对象还必须支持对象元素语法（必须具有公共的无参数构造函数）。In order to support this syntax, the `commandParameterObject` object must also support object element syntax (must have a public parameterless constructor).

summary.span: 获取或设置命令的目标元素。

span.span: Gets or sets the target element of the command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 Windows Presentation Foundation 命令系统中， 对象的 属性仅在 为 时才适用。In the Windows Presentation Foundation commanding system, the property on an object is applicable only when the is a . 如果在 上设置 并且相应的命令不是 ，则忽略命令目标。If the is set on an and the corresponding command is not a , the command target is ignored. 与 一起使用时，命令目标是引发 和 事件的对象。When used with a , the command target is the object on which the and events are raised. 如果未设置 属性，则使用键盘焦点的元素作为目标。If the property is not set, the element with keyboard focus is used as the target. 类本身不支持 XAML 用法，因为它不公开公共的无参数构造函数（有一个无参数的构造函数，但它受保护）。The class itself does not support XAML usage, because it does not expose a public parameterless constructor (there is a parameterless constructor, but it is protected). 但是，派生类可以公开公共构造函数，因此可以将从 继承的属性设置为 XAML 用法。However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and therefore can set properties that are inherited from with a XAML usage. 可以在 XAML 中实例化的两个现有 派生类，并且可以在 XAML 中设置属性 和 。Two existing derived classes that can be instantiated in XAML and can set properties in XAML are and . ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` 支持对象元素语法的 的派生类，如 或 。A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or . 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. `bindingToTarget` 一个字符串，该字符串使用可以返回对现有命名元素的对象引用的绑定语法类型。A string that uses a type of binding syntax that can return an object reference to an existing named element. 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 输入手势是调用命令的操作。The input gesture is the action that invokes the command. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 中的输入笔势的示例 和 。Examples of input gestures in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] are and . 是 和一组 的组合。A is a combination of a and a set of . 是 和一组 的组合。A is a combination of a and a set of . 类本身不支持 XAML 用法，因为它不公开公共的无参数构造函数（有一个无参数的构造函数，但它受保护）。The class itself does not support XAML usage, because it does not expose a public parameterless constructor (there is a parameterless constructor, but it is protected). 但是，派生类可以公开公共构造函数，因此可以将从 继承的属性设置为 XAML 用法。However, derived classes can expose a public constructor and thus can set properties that are inherited from with a XAML usage. 可以在 XAML 中实例化的两个现有 派生类，并且可以在 XAML 中设置属性 和 。Two existing derived classes that can be instantiated in XAML and can set properties in XAML are and . ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage < `Gesture`= ""/>< `Gesture`=""/> - 或 --or- < `Gesture`= ""/>< `Gesture`=""/> - 或 --or- <`inputBindingDerivedClass` `Gesture`= ""/><`inputBindingDerivedClass` `Gesture`=""/> ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `inputBindingDerivedClass` 支持对象元素语法的 的派生类，如 或 。A derived class of that supports object element syntax, such as or . 请参阅“备注”。See Remarks. `inputGestureImplementation` 支持对象元素语法的 自定义派生类。A custom derived class of that supports object element syntax. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用 将 绑定到 。The following example shows how to use a to bind a to a . 按下 ALT + L 时，将调用 命令。When the ALT+L is pressed, the command is invoked. [!code-xaml[commandlibrarysnippets#KeyBindingWithKeyAndModifiersXAML](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandLibrarySnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#keybindingwithkeyandmodifiersxaml)] [!code-csharp[commandlibrarysnippets#KeyBindingWithKeyAndModifiers](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandLibrarySnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#keybindingwithkeyandmodifiers)] [!code-vb[commandlibrarysnippets#KeyBindingWithKeyAndModifiers](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandLibrarySnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#keybindingwithkeyandmodifiers)]
